title: Ditto is best pokemon.
body:
https://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M5da9f6295ebcf1669c1c3a6501be8069H0&pid=15.1

He is the best and he is the jack of all trades.

Can also breed with literal anything that can have sex.

Rule 1: No downvoting.
Rule 2: Only positive thoughts allowed.

Failure to follow these rules will result in a report.
